type.description: A generic Tester that runs a single configurable command responsible for orchestrating the whole measurement and producing a result.json file. (When type==generic)

environ.description: Object whose properties are set as environment variables (When type==generic)

results.description: Colon separated list of json-formatted files containing the test results.  Tispy combines the contents of these files under the "out" key of results.json

script.description: Script to execute in a shell.  The string is subject to variable substitution, so environment variables can be specified in the command line. (When type==generic)
